data.title: The Adventures of Abney & Teal: Season 2 — The Movie Database (TMDB)
data.text:
1

It is a very cold day. Abney, Teal, Neep and the Poc-Pocs have a wonderful time playing winter games.

2

It is a hot and sunny day on the island, so Abney and Teal make themselves some shady straw hats. Then the weather turns and a strong wind starts blowing them into all sorts of trouble.

3

The Visit

0%

Neep's friends and relations come to the island for a visit, but their digging soon causes a few problems around the place.

Weiterlesen

Expand

You need to be logged in to continue. Click here to login or here to sign up.

4

Teal is having a lovely time in the flowers that are blooming all over the island. She brings a bunch to Abney but they make him sneeze... and sneeze... and sneeze! His unstoppable sneezes get bigger and bigger and funny things start to happen.

Weiterlesen

Expand

You need to be logged in to continue. Click here to login or here to sign up.

5

The Handbag

0%

Abney and Teal go fishing. Teal soon loses interest, but Abney finally catches something very interesting - a handbag, the contents of which cause all sorts of chaos.

Weiterlesen

Expand

You need to be logged in to continue. Click here to login or here to sign up.

6

Abney and Teal construct a dragon. Neep puts on a brave face, but he isn't sure he wants to share the island with a scary monster!

Weiterlesen

Expand

You need to be logged in to continue. Click here to login or here to sign up.

7

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. Abney, Teal and Neep make mysterious noises on a misty day. They try to get Bop to join in the game but it's not so mysterious down by the lake.

Weiterlesen

8

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. It is a boiling hot day; much too hot to do anything apart from eat ice-cream and go swimming. But when Abney and Teal finally get to the lake there's something not quite right about it.

9

Hiccups

0%

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. The Poc-Pocs have got hiccups. Teal finds the cure, but they are spreading! When they reach Bop something has to be done.

10

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. Abney plants seeds in the moonlight. In the morning some have grown into lovely big cabbages. Abney and Teal decide to help out one that is struggling, which leads to big trouble.

Weiterlesen

11

The Summerhouse

0%

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. When Abney and Teal have a snooze in Abney's new summerhouse, they don't wake up where they expect. Abney has to use his building skills to find them a way home.

Weiterlesen

12

Brilliant Wheels

0%

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. Neep finds some wheels, Teal finds some wheels and finally, Abney gets hold of some wheels of his own. They are not brilliant at first - but soon they become a bit too brilliant!

13

Bop's Babies

0%

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. On a beautiful springtime day, it looks like Bop has had little babies! Abney and Teal find out just how much trouble growing babies can be.

Sleep Digging

0%

Animated adventures. Neep causes watery mischief all over the Island when he starts digging in his sleep.

15

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. Abney is making porridge bread, but he just can't get the recipe right, and he ends up with lots of spare loaves and nothing to do with them.

16

Abney's Aquarium

0%

Animated adventures of two friends who live on an island in the middle of the big city. Abney adds some shiny fish to his collection, but soon finds that they take up more room than expected. Now where can he get some sleep?

17

Shadows

0%

The moonlight is so strange and beautiful that it's hard for Abney to sleep. Teal decides to tire Abney out with an adventure, but she's soon feeling pretty sleepy herself. Luckily there's still a lot to look at.

The Café

0%

Animated adventures. Abney and Teal decide to set up a café. They're worried that they might not get any guests, but they needn't have worried!

Animated adventures. Abney has so many precious things that he decides to put on a display. The display gets longer and longer until...

Frogs

0%

Animated adventures. A thunderstorm brings some visitors to the Island. Abney and Teal love their new friends, but Neep is not so sure.

Sticky Neep

0%

Animated adventures. Neep gets himself into a sticky situation copying tricks from the circus. Abney and Teal help him to get cleaned up.

Abney and Teal decide to build a Porridge Machine. Oh dear, the machine is rather tiring, and it has some other unexpected results too!

Abney's got a camera. Everybody do something fun! Soon Neep gets a go too and his photos are really special.

Spring Cleaning

0%

Abney loves spring cleaning. Teal and Neep just love springing. Soon they need to spring pretty fast, away from a scary monster!

Spots

0%

Abney and Teal are painting all sorts of things, but Neep won't join in. Soon everyone joins in with Neep instead. They all need to think of something clever to help them with their spots.

Rock Music

Abney is trying to write poems. Teal just wants to make noise! Maybe they can find a way to do both together?
